open_questions.question: Why SigmaFi isn't more popular despite being simple and effective
open_questions.context: Discussion of SigmaFi's functionality and adoption

key_facts.fact: High APR from duck pools and high demand for SigmaUSD due to low reserve ratio making SigmaUSD scarce
key_facts.speaker: tmr.erg

key_facts.fact: 20% APR for 9 months equals 27% if it were 12 months
key_facts.speaker: tmr.erg

key_facts.fact: 500 SigmaUSD can buy about 600 ERG at current rates
key_facts.speaker: tmr.erg

key_facts.fact: ERG was last this low in 2020 or 2021
key_facts.speaker: tmr.erg

key_facts.fact: Only six loan requests are over collateralized, with many under-collateralized
key_facts.speaker: tmr.erg

key_facts.fact: Loan fees are approximately $4 USD (4.5 SigmaUSD)
key_facts.speaker: tmr.erg

key_facts.fact: Fee is approximately 1% of the loan amount
key_facts.speaker: tmr.erg
